About Me

I am Khushi Khan.

Currently a sophomore at Shri G S Institute of Technology and Science pursuing B.Tech focused in Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering set to graduate by 2024. My core interests lie in Competitive Programming, Data Structures & Algorithm and Design, implementing the study of these disciplines in the workplace.

I'm a passionate software developer with a knack of learning something new everyday, working to better understand how to make impactful scalable softwares. Currently seeking opportunities to gain work experience and exposure alongside my undergraduate academic career.

My Projects

Breast Cancer Classification Model

    Made with:

Created a Breast Cancer Prediction model that can predict whether the cancer is benign or malignant with 97% accuracy. Used 32 features of cells nuclei present in the tumor to predict the disease. Developed and trained the model using algorithms like Logisitic Regression, Decision Tree and Random Forest.
